{{Lang|'''Mao Xiangling<ref name="mao" group="Note" />'''|zh=卯香菱|zh_rm=Mǎo Xiānglíng}} is a playable [[Pyro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

She is the Head Chef at the [[Wanmin Restaurant]] and runs it alongside her father [[Chef Mao]]. As a chef, Xiangling isn't afraid to try out different recipes or "exotic" ingredients... making her dishes sometimes quite unique.

She can be obtained for free in the permanent [[Spiral Abyss Event - People's Choice]] by clearing Floor 3, Chamber 3 of the [[Spiral Abyss]].
